Arg.V:
#!/bin/bash
function updatepk() { if [ ! -z $1 ]; then if [ -e /var/run/yum.pid ];then exit 10 fi result=`yum -y update $1 2>&1` status=$? commandexist=`echo $result | grep -E "yum: command not found"` if [ "$commandexist" != "" ]; then exit 8 fi
commandexist=`echo $result | grep -E "yum: No such file or directory"` if [ "$commandexist" != "" ]; then exit 8 fi
islock=`echo $result | grep -E "lock /var/run/yum.pid"`
if [ "$islock" != "" ]; then exit 10 fi
islock=`echo $result | grep -E "/var/run/yum.pid: another copy is running"`
if [ "$islock" != "" ]; then exit 10 fi
isnotconnected=`echo $result | grep -E "There was an error communicating with RHN"` if [ "$isnotconnected" != "" ]; then exit 9 fi
isnotconnected=`echo $result | grep -E "This system is not registered with RHN"` if [ "$isnotconnected" != "" ]; then exit 9 fi
isnotconnected=`echo $result | grep -E "No Repositories Available to Set Up"` if [ "$isnotconnected" != "" ]; then exit 9 fi isnotconnected=`echo $result | grep -E "Error Class Code: 9 Error Class Info: Invalid System Credentials"` if [ "$isnotconnected" != "" ]; then exit 9 fi isscriptletfailed=`echo $result | grep -E "error:" | grep -E "scriptlet failed, exit status 255"` if [ "$isscriptletfailed" != "" ]; then exit 6 fi if [ $status -ne 0 ];then exit 7 fi fi } updatepk libnetfilter_conntrack
exit 0

Vulnerability.Title: libnetfilter_conntrack bug fix and enhancement update
Vulnerability.Description:
Updated libnetfilter_conntrack packages that fix several bugs and add various enhancements are now available for Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7. libnetfilter_conntrack is a userspace library providing a programming interface (API) to the in-kernel connection tracking state table.
The libnetfilter_conntrack packages have been upgraded to upstream version 1.0.6, which provides a number of bug fixes and enhancements over the previous version. Notably, this update adds support of IPv6 Network Address Translation (NAT) to the libnetfilter_conntrack library. As a result, libnetfilter_conntrack can now create connection tracking for IPv6 NAT entries. (BZ#1430333)
Users of libnetfilter_conntrack are advised to upgrade to these updated packages, which fix these bugs and add these enhancements.
Note for remediation: Please disable the SELinux for RHEL 4/5 when repairing, or some rpm packages will fail to install.
